name: PageReferences

properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

parameters.name: source
parameters.description: The text or insertion point to which the page reference points.
The page number for an index page reference or the last page in an index page reference page range. (Optional)
parameters.name: pageReferenceType
pageReferenceLimit
parameters.description: The paragraph style or number of paragraphs or pages that defines the last page in a page range. Valid only when page reference type specifies the next use of a paragraph style or a number of paragraphs or pages. . Can accept: ParagraphStyle or Long Integer. (Optional)

parameters.name: pageNumberStyleOverride
parameters.description: The style override for the page number.  (Optional)

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new PageReference (Optional)

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the PageReference.

methods.name: item
methods.description: Returns the PageReference with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.name: itemByName
methods.description: Returns the PageReference with the specified name.

methods.name: itemByID
methods.description: Returns the PageReference with the specified ID.

methods.name: itemByRange
methods.description: Returns the PageReferences within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The PageReference, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: PageReference, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The PageReference, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: PageReference, Long Integer or String.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first PageReference in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last PageReference in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle PageReference in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem
methods.description: Returns the PageReference with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the PageReference that follows the desired PageReference.

methods.name: nextItem
methods.description: Returns the PageReference whose index follows the specified PageReference in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The PageReference whose index comes before the desired PageReference.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any PageReference in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every PageReference in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the PageReference.
Returns the PageReference with the specified index.

description: A collection of index page references.
